power.title: Armored Assault
power.fluff: Burying your shoulder into your shield, you plow forward through anyt foe

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. You can make the attack at any one point during this movement.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +3 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Strength +6 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Strength +9 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: +2d10 damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target 1 square.

power.title: Bloody the Field
power.fluff: You raise your weapon high, recognizing that the time has come to finish off your foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If the target is bloodied, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-third the number of healing surges you have expended

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is bloodied, it is dazed until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Axe, Hammer, or Mace:
section.text: Dazed until the end of your next turn instead.

power.title: Bludgeoning Vise
power.fluff: Your weapon crunches down on your enemy's skull before you drive your fist into your foe's face

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a hand free.

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude (unarmed)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (unarmed) + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

power.title: Come and Get It
power.fluff: You brandish your weapon and call out to your foes, luring them close through their overconfidence, and then deliver a spinning strike against them all

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each enemy in the burst that can see you
section.text: Charisma +3 vs. Will

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Charisma +6 vs. Will

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Charisma +9 vs. Will
Do not add your weapon's enhancement bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You pull the target up to 2 squares, but only if it can end the pull adjacent to you.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage.

power.title: Echoing Assault
power.fluff: You batter the foe with a mighty swing and prepare to catch it with the backswing if it doesn't have the sense to move

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is within your reach at the start of your next turn, it provokes a reactive strike from you. You can take this reactive strike even though it is your own turn.

power.title: Griffon's Wrath
power.fluff: You land a heavy blow on your foe, exposing a vulnerable spot in its defenses

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Axe, Pick, or Unarmed:
section.text: The target also takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude.

section.name: Flail, Heavy Blade, Light Blade, Polearm, or Spear:
section.text: The target also takes a -2 penalty to Reflex.

section.name: Hammer, Mace, or Staff:
section.text: The target also takes a -2 penalty to Will.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to AC against the first attack made against it before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hampering Flurry
power.fluff: Using both weapons, you attack your opponent's legs and hinder it with painful wounds

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
If the primary attack was also a hit, this attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier and the target cannot shift while it remains slowed.

power.title: Hydra Charge
power.fluff: Your advance seems brash, but it's actually a flurry of perfectly timed strikes that bewilder your foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst that you can see

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each enemy in the burst that you can see
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

power.title: Inertia Strike
power.fluff: Your tremendous swing carries your weapon to another foe even if you miss

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed melee weapon.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength -2 vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You can repeat this attack against a different creature after this one has been resolved. This additional attack can not gain this benefit.
If this additional attack misses, you cannot choose the first target when resolving the miss effect.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Make a melee basic attack against a creature other than the target.

power.title: Iron Bulwark
power.fluff: You parry blow after another, denying your foes the satisfaction of getting a solid hit

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +1 power bonus to AC, or a +2 power bonus if you are using a shield. This bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.
If you are bloodied, you also gain resist all until the end of your next turn. The resist equals one-half the number of healing surges you have expended (minimum resist 1 all).

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Menacing Strike
power.fluff: You deliver a brutal blow to one enemy, causing your other foes to recoil in fear whenever you lunge at one

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Intimidate.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Opportunity Reaction:
section.text: Trigger: An enemy ends its turn adjacent to you; You slide the triggering creature 1 square.

power.title: Not So Fast!
power.fluff: Your adversary tries to slip away, but you slip your weapon through its defenses to slow it down

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy willingly leaves your reach

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to AC against and Reflex against other attacks triggered by the triggering movement.

power.title: Opportunist's Rend
power.fluff: You deliver a series of deadly blows to an enemy that lets its guard down

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can only use this power in place of a melee basic attack when making a reactive strike or using your enforce challence class power.

power.title: Power Strike
power.fluff: By pushing yourself beyond your limits, you unleash your full wrath against a foe

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack or a Fighter at-will attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +2[W] damage.

power.title: Reckless Strike
power.fluff: You trade precision for power

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength -2 vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Savage Parry
power.fluff: With predatory speed, you violently parry, extorting pain as the penalty for your foe's impudent attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within your reach hits an ally with a melee attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the triggering attack targets you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the triggering ally takes only half damage from the triggering attack.

power.title: Stay Down
power.fluff: You're not above hitting someone who's down

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If the target is prone, you can choose to make the attack against Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is prone, you can roll damage twice and choose the higher total.

power.title: Sudden Surge
power.fluff: You throw your weight into an attack, using the momentum of your swing to surge forward

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1 square).

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you did not move the full distance before making the attack, you can move the rest of the distance. This movement does not trigger reactive strikes from the target.

power.title: Trip Up
power.fluff: You tangle your enemy's feet with your weapon

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have hit an enemy with a melee Weapon attack during this turn.

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one creature you have hit with a melee Weapon attack this turn
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Flail, Polearm, or Spear:
section.text: You can choose to knock the target prone instead of slowing it.

power.title: Twofold Torment
power.fluff: Your carefully aimed slashes send two foes reeling away in agony

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1 square).
If you have combat advantage against the target, this attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.target: one creature other than the primary target
section.text: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1 square).
If you have combat advantage against the target, this attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Weapon Master's Gambit
power.fluff: As a master of many weapons, you use this simple attack form as the starting point for expressing your weapon's nature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You may sheathe a weapon and draw a different one.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Axe:
section.text: Up to 2 creatures adjacent to the target and within your reach take damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Heavy Blade:
section.text: You gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Mace:
section.text: The target is knocked prone.

section.name: Polearm or Spear:
section.text: You slide the target 2 squares, and shift 2 squares to a space adjacent to the target.
